__e: But I've my Pierre, and the rest...
I already told big Pierre, and I'm not going over it again with li'l Paul.
You must find somewhere within yourself the strength to carry on Pierre's work and you own. Ha?
I do not trust anything about Pierre... he'd kill his father, mother and son.
Pierre's very nice to me, I don't mind him, but... I wish you wouldn't talk about him like that.
A certain Pierre... Tells you what?
And then, when you come back, you'll return to Paris.
Of course, Pierre isn't the type to let money go to his head.
Who are you? Why did you take Pierre from me ?
And this is our good friend, Pierre, from Paris.
